mapper.sql: item_id as itemId, commission_rate as commissionRate, guarantee_rate as guaranteeRate, prepaid_bonus as prepaidBonus, loan_mode as loanMode, first_ratio as firstRatio, sponsor_idcard as sponsorIdcard, sponsor_credit as sponsorCredit, principal_idcard as principalIdcard, principal_credit as principalCredit, business_licence as businessLicence, venue_rental_agreement as venueRentalAgreement, store_renderings as storeRenderings, corporate_articles as corporateArticles, asset_water_liabilities as assetWaterLiabilities, shareholder_name as shareholderName, shareholder_idcard as shareholderIdcard, shareholder_address as shareholderAddress, guarantee_name as guaranteeName, guarantee_idcard as guaranteeIdcard, guarantee_address as guaranteeAddress, pledged_shares as pledgedShares, partner_seal as partnerSeal, escrow_agreement as escrowAgreement, finance_service as financeService, finance_manage as financeManage, share_pledge_agreement as sharePledgeAgreement, guaranty_agreement as guarantyAgreement, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, operate_account as operateAccount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (item_id, commission_rate, guarantee_rate, prepaid_bonus, loan_mode, first_ratio, sponsor_idcard, sponsor_credit, principal_idcard, principal_credit, business_licence, venue_rental_agreement, store_renderings, corporate_articles, asset_water_liabilities, shareholder_name, shareholder_idcard, shareholder_address, guarantee_name, guarantee_idcard, guarantee_address, pledged_shares, partner_seal, escrow_agreement, finance_service, finance_manage, share_pledge_agreement, guaranty_agreement, create_time, update_time, operate_account) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{commissionRate}, #{guaranteeRate}, #{prepaidBonus}, #{loanMode}, #{firstRatio}, #{sponsorIdcard}, #{sponsorCredit}, #{principalIdcard}, #{principalCredit}, #{businessLicence}, #{venueRentalAgreement}, #{storeRenderings}, #{corporateArticles}, #{assetWaterLiabilities}, #{shareholderName}, #{shareholderIdcard}, #{shareholderAddress}, #{guaranteeName}, #{guaranteeIdcard}, #{guaranteeAddress}, #{pledgedShares}, #{partnerSeal}, #{escrowAgreement}, #{financeService}, #{financeManage}, #{sharePledgeAgreement}, #{guarantyAgreement}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operateAccount})
mapper.update:
UPDATE
item_id=#{itemId},
commission_rate=#{commissionRate},
guarantee_rate=#{guaranteeRate},
prepaid_bonus=#{prepaidBonus},
loan_mode=#{loanMode},
first_ratio=#{firstRatio},
sponsor_idcard=#{sponsorIdcard},
sponsor_credit=#{sponsorCredit},
principal_idcard=#{principalIdcard},
principal_credit=#{principalCredit},
business_licence=#{businessLicence},
venue_rental_agreement=#{venueRentalAgreement},
store_renderings=#{storeRenderings},
corporate_articles=#{corporateArticles},
asset_water_liabilities=#{assetWaterLiabilities},
shareholder_name=#{shareholderName},
shareholder_idcard=#{shareholderIdcard},
shareholder_address=#{shareholderAddress},
guarantee_name=#{guaranteeName},
guarantee_idcard=#{guaranteeIdcard},
guarantee_address=#{guaranteeAddress},
pledged_shares=#{pledgedShares},
partner_seal=#{partnerSeal},
escrow_agreement=#{escrowAgreement},
finance_service=#{financeService},
finance_manage=#{financeManage},
share_pledge_agreement=#{sharePledgeAgreement},
guaranty_agreement=#{guarantyAgreement},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
operate_account=#{operateAccount},
item_id = #{itemId}
